args:
Just as the prince is about to claim the Shard,
a man who resembles King Aurelius appears
and makes off with both Zethia and the Shard.
The prince and his friends rest in an old castle
called the Halidom, then make for the royal city.
Ugh... I can't see anything in all this mist.
Are you SURE this is the way?
Yes... Or at least, it will be.\n{player_name}, head that way,\ninto the deepest part of the mist.
{player_name} acts on Cleo's words\nand takes a step into the mist.
The moment he does, countless rays of light flood\nthe forest, dispelling the mist like a bad dream.
Almost as if it were welcoming him as the\nland's new king.
Just look at it... You'd never know a land\nthis large was hiding in the mist.
So pretty! It's just like the pictures of\nOld Alberia I saw in my storybooks.
The vista and fresh air are revitalizing me.\nI can feel my memory starting to clear.
I cannot believe this day has finally come.
There it is, {player_name}.\nThat is the Sacred Shard you have\nbeen searching for.
I've never seen anything so lovely.
Now we just need to return it to\nthe royal city.
Everyone will be so pleased!\nI cannot wait to tell Father.
You will hand over that wretched\nShard...right...now.
F-Father? But I thought you went to the\nBinding Ruins.
Oh, I went. Indeed I went.
I awoke in the miasma and reclaimed\none of what was lost.
What are you talking about, Father?\nYou're not making any sense!
I thank you for removing the detestable\nbarrier protecting this land.
I set all the fiends I could muster upon it,\nbut the sylvan kept thwarting my efforts.
However, you have solved that problem.
Now nothing stands in my way.
So those fiends WERE being controlled\nby someone.
Good! I've been lookin' for someone to\nblame for all this fiend nonsense.
Looks like King Jerkface here is the guy\nI need to talk to.
You have me all wrong, my friend.\nI am the king of mercy.
Because today is the day I grant you all\neternal rest!
Rrgh... Who the hell is this guy?\nHe hits as hard as a...dragon...
Nnnh... He is using a forbidden curse\nto obstruct our mana!
Why do you look like our father?!
Heh heh heh! And why would I tell an\ninsignificant little speck like you?
Now come, Auspex. Surrender to me,\nand I will spare the others.
You and the Shard are all I want.\nI care not if these maggots live or die.

Just as the prince is about to claim the Shard,
a man who resembles King Aurelius appears
and makes off with both Zethia and the Shard.
The prince and his friends rest in an old castle
called the Halidom, then make for the royal city.
I won't leave you here to die,\nand I will not surrender!
What's...going on? My body is feeling...\nhot...and I feel power...that's welling\ninside of me...I...
He shapeshifted without a pact?\nHow is that possible? Do I somehow have\nthe power to awaken his dragonblood?
You vile, accursed creature!\nHow dare you stand in my way again!\n
What just happened?\nZethia, did you do...that?
Brother! Are you all right?! Stay with us!
Dragonblood and maiden's prayer have\nunited to awaken the new king...
The cycle repeats...and that I cannot abide.
Are you kiddin' me? How is he still\nstandin' after getting nailed by an attack\nlike that?
Zethia... Again! Give me that power again!
It's the only way to protect everyone!
You're in no state to shapeshift again.
Your wounds have opened, and doing so\ncould kill you. Please, Your Highness...
He's getting up? The wretched fool...
He does remind me of Alberius...\nBut today the dragon bloodline ends!
Only if you swear to spare their lives.
Zethia, no! What are you saying?!
One day, {player_name} will\nsave our people. Alberia cannot afford\nto lose him.
If we try to resist, all of us will perish.
The wisest choice is for me to obey.
At least one of you has some sense.
You're injured, Your Highness!\nHe'll kill you if you try anything!
Right now, ya need to heal up so we can\nfigure out what'n blazes just happened.
All...all right. We'll return to the royal city\nas soon as I can move.
Father will know who that impostor was.
Sounds like we got us a big battle ahead.\nHa! Sign me up!
The mist has cleared. That means the\ncastle here is ours to use.
It is called the Halidom. This is where\nAlberius the Founder's dynasty began.
We should tarry here for a while\nand explore the castle.
We may find something useful for\nthe battles ahead.
Also, if you will have me, I wish to\naccompany you and offer what help I can.
You've been a lot of help, Cleo.\nWe'd be lucky to have you.
All right, everyone. We'll rest at the\nHalidom and prepare for the next leg\nof our journey.
